# 极客爱情

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/jike-aiqing
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/jike-aiqing
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install jike-aiqing
jike-aiqing <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g jike-aiqing
jike-aiqing <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
